name: AICodeReview
description: Automatically review Pull Requests using GitHub Copilot. Analyzes code for security, performance, and best practices.
author: Rachit Singhal

inputs.name: githubPat
inputs.label: GitHub Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: GitHub PAT with Copilot access permissions. Generate a fine-grained token at https://github.com/settings/tokens with 'Copilot Requests' permission.

inputs.name: adoPat
inputs.label: Azure DevOps PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure DevOps PAT for API access. Leave empty to use System.AccessToken (recommended). Required for Azure DevOps Server (on-prem).

inputs.name: copilotModel
inputs.label: Copilot Model
inputs.helpMarkDown: AI model for review. Leave empty for default (claude-sonnet-4.5). Models available depend on your Copilot subscription.

inputs.name: maxFiles
inputs.label: Max Files to Review
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of files to include in the review. Files beyond this limit are skipped.

inputs.name: maxLinesPerFile
inputs.label: Max Lines per File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Files with more lines than this are truncated. Helps stay within model context limits.

inputs.name: customPrompt
inputs.label: Custom Review Prompt
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the default review prompt with custom instructions. Avoid double quotes ("). Supports markdown formatting.

inputs.name: promptFile
inputs.label: Prompt File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a .txt file containing custom review instructions. Overridden by 'Custom Review Prompt' if both are set.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.label: Enable Debug Logging
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable verbose debug output in the pipeline logs.

inputs.name: continueOnError
inputs.label: Continue on Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, the pipeline will not fail if the review encounters an error. A warning comment will be posted instead.
